availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Rachel Ballard. Father of Thomas Ballard, Mary J. Ballard, Arabella Ballard, John Ballard, Melvina Ballard, Eliza Ballard, John W. Ballard, Elizabeth Ballard, and Cestra Ballard. Farmer in Montgomery County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery, District 2, p. 70. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery, not stated, p. 43.
